mini_smelter.name: Mini Smelter
mini_smelter.desc: Converts 6 ore into 2 metals per use.

mini_brewery.name: Mini Brewery
mini_brewery.desc: Converts 4 gas to 2 liquor per use.

chem_plant.name: Chem Plant
chem_plant.desc: Converts 6 gas and 2 energy to 4 chemicals per tick.

industrial_smelter.name: Industrial Brewery
industrial_smelter.desc: Converts 60 ore and 40 energy to 40 metals per tick.

industrial_brewery.name: Industrial Brewery
industrial_brewery.desc: Converts 35 gas and 2 exotic matter to 30 liquor per tick.
